short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that opens a new tab, the background of the tab will show a cute silly cat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect place to be if you’re a cat lover.
Enhance any new tab with exciting images for cat lovers.
When opening a new tab, the background of the tab will show a silly cat scene.

The new tab embeds a search bar powered by Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing the Silly Cats extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy elaborated on the Qltymedia website. By installing this you hereby accept the new tab extension & it’s search services 
Privacy Policy: https://qltymedia.com/silly-cats/#privacy_policy
EULA: https://qltymedia.com/silly-cats/#eula
